entry.title: SMIL on?
entry.summary: Well, it turns out that SVG's built-in animation features were never deprecated as planned. Sure, CSS and JavaScript are more than capable of carrying the load, but it's good to know that SMIL is not dead in the water as previously thought, and is actually well-supported. SMIL on? originally published on CSS-Tricks, which is part of the DigitalOcean family. You should get the newsletter.
